description:
Shishito dies in an accident two hours after stealing 30 million yen from Beika Finance. Before his accident, he hid the money somewhere. Kogoro is hired by Ryozen, head priest of Dongaraji Temple, to find the culprit who made the phone threat demanding that construction on the temple be halted. It becomes clear that brothers Toraya Kinta and Ginsuke became flustered when they saw construction had begun on the temple. Conan hears a strange story about Eisaku, the father of the brothers. Kogoro believes the Toraya family and the missing 30 million yen are connected and jumps to all kinds of conclusions, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hidden Secret of Dongaraji Temple
